_comments.udp_listen_port: UDP port on which Pi listens for ESP32 distance packets (default 5005)
_comments.distance_threshold_cm: Fork height threshold in cm. Alert triggers when distance < threshold
_comments.pause_duration_seconds: How long pause button silences alerts (default 120 = 2 minutes)
_comments.alert_wav_path: Full path to horn warning WAV audio file
_comments.pause_button_gpio: BCM GPIO pin number for pause button (wired to GPIO17 in schematics)
_comments.min_interval_between_alerts_sec: Minimum seconds between consecutive alerts (prevents alert spam)
_comments.audio_output: Audio output method: 'usb' for USB audio adapter, 'gpio_pwm' for Pi 5 GPIO 12/13 PWM audio (requires dtoverlay=pwm-2chan), 'headphone_jack' for onboard 3.5mm jack, 'hdmi' for HDMI audio (may need to uninstall pulseaudio and add hdmi_drive=2 to /boot/firmware/config.txt)
